title: Engineer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia
Interview Descriptions: An interviewer asked about series of questions related to personal life, technical experience, previous work experience, software being used. Why do you want to work in our company. How do you find the role.

title: Researcher Interview
Application Type: The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia in Jan 2023
Interview Descriptions: Here are some tips that might help you make the most of your internship: Meet your coworkers Set goals Watch and learn Be professional Keep busy Stay organized Manage your time wisely Keep track of your projects Buy a coffee for your contacts
Interview Questions: Here are some tips that might help you make the most of your internship: Meet your coworkers Set goals Watch and learn Be professional Keep busy Stay organized Manage your time wisely Keep track of your projects Buy a coffee for your contacts

title: Science Officer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia
Interview Descriptions: The panel was nice and the interview questions is were breathtaking and beyond the what the candidates thought. Overall, it is a good experience interviewed by the well-knowledge panel. All the candidates showed very much passionate to answer the panel questions
Interview Questions: Why UTM should take you working there ?

title: Senior Lecturer Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. The process took 5 months. I interviewed at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (Johor Bahru)
Interview Descriptions: Have 3 phases. Firstly personality test, secondly mockup teaching and lastly interview with around 8-10 panel . U should know that to be as lecturer not only about teaching but also about management.
Interview Questions: How to ensure your student understand? Any approach?

title: Administrative Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (Johor Bahru) in Apr 2021
Interview Descriptions: Self-introduction and several general questions. Can answer in Malay or English language. The process is smooth and well. No stress during the interview session, answer with calm and enjoy the whole process. Must do competency test.
Interview Questions: What did you do during your study?

title: Business Decelopment Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia
Interview Descriptions: Good smooth and easy going. The process wS fairly smooth and i was kept informed and it was good like i had to answer a few questions and I was a good time
Interview Questions: My past experience, very good experience

title: Graduate Student Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (Johor Bahru) in Jun 2020
Interview Descriptions: Not very hard, interviewer very patient, they listened to all what u say about without any judging. Good experience to be interviewed. Very recommend to study here at UTM, Malaysia.
Interview Questions: What is your strengths and limitations?

title: RCC Member Interview
Application Type: I applied through college or university. I interviewed at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (Johor Bahru) in Mar 2019
Interview Descriptions: Applied through email. Got a call. It was open interview with all the participant at a time. There were 5 interviewers in total. The process was crystal clear to select a RCC member for KDOJ hostel. As all the participants are able to see who are giving the best answers.
Interview Questions:
How I solve problem? 
What I can do for Hostel students welfare?

title: Postdoctoral Research Fellow Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 5 months. I interviewed at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia
Interview Descriptions: actually no interview for the postdoc positions. We need to approach the supervisor of our field with our cv and publications list, if he/she agreed, tells us to write the forma project proposa, put infront of the research management team for approval.
Interview Questions: On the basis of our publications and our experience and supervisor's backgournd, they will select the applicant.

title: Associate Professor Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (Johor Bahru)
Interview Descriptions: Requires a total of seven referees before interview by the university's top management. Process will take 3-6 months. Looks at publications (minimum 15 journal papers, 5 ISI indexed), H-index, consultancy contribution, management, student advisory roles, international recognition and corporate social responsibilities.  Requires a minimum of 120 total credits hours of teaching.
Interview Questions: What are your immediate and long term future plans should you succeed in getting this post?

title: Internship Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 1 day. I interviewed at Universiti Teknologi Malaysia (Kuala Lumpur) in Apr 2010
Interview Descriptions: i get an phone call around 5pm to ask whether i am available for the interview. it was very spontaneous but and rather suprising.
Interview Questions: what do you know about this company
